import React, { useState } from "react"; const Signup = () => { const [userRegister, setUserRegister] = useState({ username: "", phone: "", password: "", repeatpassword: "", }); const handleInput = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setUserRegister({ ...userRegister, [name]: value }); }; return ( <>
